The Charleston Ballet salutes the following major contributors to Fund for the Arts whose annual gifts of $10,000+ help keep culture strong in the Kanawha Valley:

City of Charleston

Cecil I. Walker Machinery

Daywood Foundation

Dutch Miller Automotive Group

Spillman Thomas & Battle, PLLC

Truist Foundation of WV

Site By Blue Fin Solutions

The Charleston Ballet is pleased to provide common accommodations for individuals who have challenges with vision, hearing or mobility, as well as work with individuals who have other needs by request to make performances, activities, and other services as accessible as possible.
